entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:02 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 02:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
